name: PSO2NGS Mod Manager
description: Added more ways to add mods into Mod Manager
Fixed no original files found issue when applying win32reboot_na mods

win32_na and win32reboot_na mods will now be backed up locally if files are not found on sega's servers. As always, make sure to restore your game files to their original state before using the Mod Manager
Added a local backup folder for profile2
Switched to a slower files replacing method for boundary modification feature to prevent lockups on some machines
Some translation corrections and other bug fixes
